DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect silver contain dressing ( Acticoat Post-Op ) compare standard dressing ( OpSite PostOp ) post elective cesarean section wound complication obese woman ( BMI > 35 ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Use Silver Containing Dressing ( Acticoat ) Wound Complication Rates Post Elective Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Women schedule elective cesarean section term recruit participate study . The investigator plan recruit 100 woman . Baseline demographic information obtain pre-op visit . Eligible subject randomize receive silver contain dress ( Acticoat PostOp ) standard dress ( OpSite PostOp ) . A randomization table computer generate block 20 . A sealed opaque envelope contain assign dress accompany patient operating room . Standard antibiotic prophylaxis provide prior skin incision . A subcuticular suture use skin closure . At time skin closure , envelope open assigned dress apply . The dress change saturate . The dress remove time discharge hospital . A questionnaire regard wound complication complete time discharge hospital , 2 week post-op 6 week post-op .
DOC.criteria: Women schedule elective cesarean section BMI > 35 preop visit consent participate allergy silver immunocompromised ( HIV/AIDS , immunosuppressive medication )
